summary: Build a task/todo-style app with a Settings area (language selection, profile, notifications) and a Statistics area showing daily completion percentage plus weekly/monthly averages, with navigation links in a bottom bar.
architectural_notes: Statistics require per-day aggregation of completed vs total items to compute daily % and weekly/monthly averages.
Add bottom navigation (persistent) to access core sections (Home, Settings, Stats).
known_issues: User reports some requested features were not added previously (needs verification/regression check).

existing_features.title: Add a persistent bottom navigation bar (sticky at the bottom of the viewport) for authenticated users that provides one-tap navigation to: Settings, Languages, Profile, Notifications, Statistics, and Averages.
Add frontend routes and pages for Languages, Profile, Notifications, and Averages, and ensure each is reachable from the new bottom navigation bar.
Update the layout spacing so page content is not hidden behind the new sticky bottom navigation bar.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Settings page with language selection
Add done/not-done checkbox control to mark items as completed
Add daily statistics: completion percentage based on checked items, displayed as an animated circular progress indicator
Add bottom navigation bar linking to key pages (Settings, Languages, Profile, Notifications, Statistics/Averages, Home)

projectName: Add bottom navigation for Settings, Languages, Profile, Notifications, and Statistics/Averages
